title: Ok type
text: The restaurant was not a wow. Food was OK although we had to wait for sometime. There meat shish kebab was great. Prices were OK not that expensive.

title: Beautiful
text: There is a lot to walk to reach the Parthenon. Entrance fee is 10€ pp. If u are on a wheelchair its impossible to visit this site. Beautiful sceneries once you reach on top.

title: Nice Hotel
text: The hotel location is quite good. Its inside so no traffic to disturb at night. The staff are very good. Breakfast was OK a bit of some changes. We stayed for 4 days. The weather was good although it was mid December. Walking distance to the tourist areas. Restaurants nearby were expensive. The metro station acropolis is 2 minutes walk.

title: Beautiful
text: Its near the place area. Had to walk a lot to get up. Tickets cost 10€. We went there around 11.00 so not many people were there. There are places to sit if you get tired.

title: Lots of varieties
text: I loved their tasty & delicious ice-cream. Lots of choices. They have all types of flavors. Prices were OK being in a tourist area. Would certainly like to try their pistachio ice cream.

title: Dinner
text: Went for Dinner. Had ordered Mishkaki & Nundhu. Good got cold while we were still eating. The stuff which they were selling on the shelves were too high even to touch.

title: Enjoyed
text: We spent half day on this tour. Its far from Chiang mai. There are lots of activities to do there. Lunch buffee was included. Food was very good. Had great time spending with the elephants.

title: Passtime
text: People there sell the same stuff. Prices are very high so need to bargain a lot. I prefer doing shopping in Bangkok. Massages are quite cheap.

title: Not a wow hotel
text: Very simple hotel. Only 1 lady speaks English. Rooms are very simple. Breakfast horrible. They provide cold food even eggs were cold. I ordered special food pasta with veggies but pasta were over boiled n got only red cabbage. Don't book room with breakfast as there r couple of restaurants closeby who serves good breakfast

title: Interesting & Historical place
text: We took a taxi from Kerbala to Babylon which took us a little more than 1 hr. Visited all the attractions in babylon. Just need 2 he's and you have seen most of the places. Security is high there while we were there we went to see one of sadams palace which was on top of the hill with a beautiful view. A must if you ever visit Karbala

title: Ziara
text: You are a lucky person if you visit this place . place cant be described. Its so amazing. The crowd is huge so you need to hold hands with the person you are in order not to loose that soneone

title: A must visit
text: Just loved being there. So peaceful place. Its a heaven on earth. It was the most beautiful place I have visited
place: Imam Ali Ibn Abi Talib Shrine

title: Nice hotel
text: The hotel was good near the shrine. Staff were extremely helpful that they went out of their way to help me. Food was terrible. We got the same food for 3 days with very few changes. Breakfast we got Sim leftovers pizza which we got during dinner. Need to change the cook who doesn't know how to cook Iraqi food.

title: Nice food
text:
We had ordered chops, Taka tak, sheesh kebab, naan & Paratha. The food was good but not WOW. Their Taka Tak was very oily. Removed almost 5 tablespoon of oil on 1 serving. They have good chops.
.

title: Wouldn't Recommend
text: Not my cup of tea at this Chaiwala. The chai was not that hot and was not fresh as he removed from some container to give it to us. I have had better chais in my life

title: Celebrated birthday
text: Nice & cozy restaurant. Delicious dishes with a good service. Prices are reasonable. Environment was too loud.

title: Short visit
text: Went on a Monday n it was closed. Not much to see from but From outside it looked beautiful. Most of the things are closed on Monday's so avoid going on that day

title: Nice restaurant
text: I ate at this rest.couple of times. Food is very good but only 1 waiter serving was a bit a running for him from 1 table to another. Prices r reasonable.

title: Beautiful Island
text: The short boat ride to c the corals. Beautiful small island. We paid 1000rupees for an hrs ride to c the corals which was worth every penny. A must c if u visit port blair

title: Nice trip
text: Modern type of catamaran. Although the speed is very low. Port BLAIR to hAvelock took 1 hr n 40. Enjoyed the ride.

title: Worst Island
text: I went with my 2 friends as soon as we reached the island we looked around as nothing to do all there. Waisted of money n time. We just sat there for more than an hr waiting for our boat to take us back. Nothing to c n do.

title: Budget place
text: Hotel is a bit on a off side. Difficult to get a rickshaw at times. There is no elevator at the Hotel. The owner is very nice. They r Gujaratis n the breakfast was good. Young boys at the reception r ok.

title: Not worth
text: We stayed for 1nite as we entered.the room the smell of refresher was terrible to bear. The bed for too small for.2 adults. The room was too small too to keep our handluggge. We got.the room on.the 2 nd floor n the elevator was not working.

title: Avoid booking this hotel
text: I had booked this Hotel with Goibibo but once booking was done with the price given, 1guy called my friend as said that we shud pay more Money when we check in!!!! We cancelled the booking at once. Blue bridge there r better hotels than urs so don't be greedy

title: First n Last time
text: While in Mumbai my friend suggested this restaurant. The prices very Soo high. Nothing grand any the place or food. I got my food first after finishing my dinner my friend got hers. I complained but the waiter's had deaf ears. Service was Zero. Management was hopeless. The food was not that good eather. They didn't have much to choose from the menu.

title: Terrible Food
text: The food was not good at all. I have eaten very good Afghanistan food but this was worst. No taste at all.

title: Fantastic food
text: Whenever I m in Toronto I must visit this restaurant. It's one of my favorites. The food is simply delicious. During weekends u need to wait at least 30-1hr due to the rush. I usually order take away. There is lots to choose from the menu.

title: Tasty food
text: Visited this restaurant for the 1st as I had heard the food was good so had to try. Yes it was very delicious n lots of varieties. The prices were reasonable too. It's a walking distance from Stockholm south train station. Although we did order different types of spicy food but very spicy was too hot.. will certainly visit this restaurant again

title: Wonderful place to stay
text: Great location.  The most comfortable, spacious and clean room . Love the delicious food. Staff friendly and attentive. Location is wonderful for shopping. I enjoyed the quietness, the cleanliness and the lovely staff. I would be more than happy to stay here again in the near future. Room was very well appointed. This is my 3rd time I am staying @ Aristo n 4th time will b soon again very soon. Wi-Fi worked seamlessly, as it’s very important for me to reach my family any time of the day. No hesitation in recommending this hotel for overnight or longer stays

title: Nice hotel
text: We stayed at the hotel apartment which had 3 rooms. It was a very nice apartment. It's far from the city n quite inside from the main road. There were no tuk tuk around so we had to take a motorcycle to call for a tuk tuk. Taxis were there but their prices were very high not worth at all. Breakfast was not included with the room so it not a cheap hotel in a place like Mombasa where there weren't so many tourists due to the election

title: Ok hotel
text: It's a small hotel. We had booked 4 rooms but in 1 room the whole bed was of bed bugs so b careful of this hotel. Breakfast was ok. Staff were ok too. It's far from town I didn't c any taxis around as we had our own car

title: Good food
text: Liked this restaurant. Visited when I was young and now after 20 years it's almost the same. Loved the food n service was very fast in the middle of the city

title: WORST HOTEL DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL
text:
I stayed at this nightmare hotel for 3 nights. Worst hotel I have come across. I had to change the room on my 1st night as the room was smelly and so the toilet. They gave me another terrible room where there was no water. I got late at night so didn’t realized until next morning. In breakfast had ordered bread and omelett but was served only omelett as "he forgot to bring the bread". Had to call several times from the room but still no one came.
The hotel was almost empty but still these people didn’t have any courtesy at all. This hotel is worst than motel not even 1 star.
